result.eng: The house is like a castle.
result.ga: tá an teach cosúil le caisleán
result.orig: Tá an teach cosúil le caisleán
result.html: tá an teach cosúil le caisleánThe house is like a castle.
result.ponchtml: tá an teaċ cosúil le caisleánThe house is like a castle.

result.ga: tá tú cosúil le mo mháthair
result.orig: Tá tú cosúil le mo mháthair
result.html: tá tú cosúil le mo mháthairYou are like my mother.
result.ponchtml: tá tú cosúil le mo ṁáṫairYou are like my mother.

result.eng: You were so alike when you were little!
result.ga: bhí sibh chomh cosúil lena chéile nuair a bhí sibh beag
result.orig: Bhí sibh chomh cosúil lena chéile nuair a bhí sibh beag
result.html: bhí sibh chomh cosúil lena chéile nuair a bhí sibh beagYou were so alike when you were little!
result.ponchtml: ḃí siḃ ċoṁ cosúil lena ċéile nuair a ḃí siḃ beagYou were so alike when you were little!

result.eng: It seems she only had one duty.
result.ga: ní raibh ach dualgas amháin uirthi is cosúil
result.orig: Ní raibh ach dualgas amháin uirthi is cosúil
result.html: ní raibh ach dualgas amháin uirthi is cosúilIt seems she only had one duty.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ aċ dualgas aṁáin uirṫi is cosúilIt seems she only had one duty.

result.eng: The attacks were apparently being planned by Osama Bin Laden's soldiers for several years.
result.ga: is cosúil go raibh na hionsaithe seo á mbeartú ag saighdiúirí osama bin laden le cúpla bliain
result.orig: Is cosúil go raibh na hionsaithe seo á mbeartú ag saighdiúirí Osama Bin Laden le cúpla bliain
result.html: is cosúil go raibh na hionsaithe seo á mbeartú ag saighdiúirí osama bin laden le cúpla bliainThe attacks were apparently being planned by Osama Bin Laden's soldiers for several years.
result.ponchtml: is cosúil go raiḃ na hionsaiṫe seo á mbeartú ag saiġdiúirí osama bin laden le cúpla bliainThe attacks were apparently being planned by Osama Bin Laden's soldiers for several years.

result.eng: It seemed that even more airplanes in American skies were targeting secret targets.
result.ga: ba chosúil go raibh níos mó eitleáin i spéartha mheiriceá ag díriú ar spriocanna rúnda
result.orig: Ba chosúil go raibh níos mó eitleáin i spéartha Mheiriceá ag díriú ar spriocanna rúnda
result.html: ba chosúil go raibh níos mó eitleáin i spéartha mheiriceá ag díriú ar spriocanna rúndaIt seemed that even more airplanes in American skies were targeting secret targets.
result.ponchtml: ba ċosúil go raiḃ níos mó eitleáin i spéarṫa ṁeiriceá ag díriú ar spriocanna rúndaIt seemed that even more airplanes in American skies were targeting secret targets.

result.eng: I guess it is their lot, as schoolmasters, to be fond of the bottle.
result.ga: is cosúil go bhfuil sé de bhuaidh orthu a bheith tugtha don ghloine mar mháistrí scoile
result.orig: Is cosúil go bhfuil sé de bhuaidh orthu a bheith tugtha don ghloine mar mháistrí scoile
result.html: is cosúil go bhfuil sé de bhuaidh orthu a bheith tugtha don ghloine mar mháistrí scoileI guess it is their lot, as schoolmasters, to be fond of the bottle.
result.ponchtml: is cosúil go ḃfuil sé de ḃuaiḋ orṫu a ḃeiṫ tugṫa don ġloine mar ṁáistrí scoileI guess it is their lot, as schoolmasters, to be fond of the bottle.

result.eng: We may be related but we are not alike.
result.html: más gaolmhar ní cosúilWe may be related but we are not alike.
result.ponchtml: más gaolṁar ní cosúilWe may be related but we are not alike.
